title: 4 reasons the economy's worst-case scenario could be looming in 2026
description: Stagflation looks increasingly likely in 2026 as the economy looks on track to grow below-trend while inflation runs "uncomfortably" hot, RBC said.
content:
The worst-case scenario for the US economy could be a looming reality in 2026. 
RBC flagged the likelihood of stagflation in 2026 as the economy looks poised to post below-trend growth while inflati… [+4203 chars]
